sub_title: Editor | Copywriter | Social Media & Content Specialist
summary:
A Tech-enthusiast Freelance Editor, Copywriter and Content Specialist.
My expertise, engagement and curiosity concern communication: I work with(in) social media management, SEO, CMS, copywriting for B2B/B2C online marketing and e-commerce.

By academic formation, I am a media specialist and cultural producer exploring the borders in-between digital cultures, arts and new technologies. My expertise in digital media, contents and cultures is corroborated by a PhD in New Media Theory and Cultural Studies.

treasury_media.title: PERSONAL WEBSITE
treasury_media.description: Roberta Colavecchio is an online editor, copywriter, and content specialist. Her freelance company STUDIOlab RC offers communication services to individuals and businesses.

projects.title: M.A.M. - Matri-Archive of the Mediterranean
projects.description:
Department of Human and Social Sciences - University of Naples “L’Orientale” (Italy)

The digital archive, a website and forthcoming app for mobile devices, collects female artistic practices in and/or about the Mediterranean area. I contribute to the project as an artistic researcher, curator, event organizer, web content writer/editor and translator. I select artists and their works, write/edit/translate press releases and web content, participate in the organization of cultural events (conferences and exhibitions), and in the concept development of the project.

projects.description:
Contribution to Diego Cibelli's art project "Domestic Extremists" with a story (title: "Octopus and the Thin Tellin or The Eternal Return of the Nascent Estate") for the volume "Entangled Relation" performed by Adela Bravo Sauras @ Italienisches Kulturinstitut Berlin

projects.title: Tarzan's House
projects.description:
Contribution to Diego Cibelli's art project "Tarzan's House Third Output" 2014 (mixed media, installation detail) 06.07 - 28.09.2014 @ Augeo Art Space - Rimini, IT

A profound evolutionary reflection based on the comparison between the dynamics of the animal and the human world in relation to their food and constructed habitats.

contributors.headline: Editor | Copywriter | Social Media & Content Specialist

projects.title: Papers for Words to Develop Cultural Plans
projects.description: A residency program organized in collaboration with artist Diego Cibelli and independent researcher Angelo Ciniglio to identify tools, strategies, and technologies for rethinking the relationship between organism and environment. The project focused on the re-elaboration of the practice of inhabiting the surrounding space, sharing it interculturally, fostering interdisciplinary exchanges, intraspecies encounters (humans and non-humans aggregates), in order to perform unpredictable citizenships.

authors.headline: Editor | Copywriter | Social Media & Content Specialist

profile_positions.description: Spotzer provides full-service online marketing solutions for small and local businesses across 16 global markets. As freelance copywriter, I create search engine optimized digital marketing content for websites and platforms of the Italian marketplace. I write product and company descriptions, details and contact pages about various topics spanning from food and restaurants, to sport and technical writing. All work is implemented in Salesforce and Duda's responsive website builder.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Copywriter / Proofreader & Editor

profile_positions.description: TransPerfect is a privately held provider of language services and related technologies. It offers a full range of language and business solutions, including Translation and Language Services, Multicultural Marketing, Legal Support, Multimedia  and Studio Solutions a.o. As freelance marketing copywriter, I work on assigned projects editing contents and writing copy for international brands and online retailers  expanding in the Italian marketplace.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Copywriter

profile_positions.description: Transnatural is an Amsterdam-based art gallery and design label that investigates the relation between nature and technologies, and operates both on local and international scale. As Content Editor, I concept and write copy for the label blog and website, I implement marketing strategies (B2B/B2C), I contribute to PR and Communications (web content editing, newsletter, e-mail marketing, and social media strategies). As Assistant Project Manager, I help in planning and running art shows, fairs, events and curatorial projects, as well as in art production (exhibitions builds-up, maintenance, and breakdowns).
profile_positions.title: Assistant Project Manager & Content Editor

profile_positions.description: STUDIOLAB RC is my freelance communication agency. I offer copywriting, editing, translating, and proofreading services for online marketing and e-commerce as well as within the cultural industries. Additionally, I offer consultancy for events management and cultural activities, including workshops, seminars, lectures and presentations in academies, think tanks, art and cultural spaces. I coordinate PR & communication, I produce documentation, catalogues, critical texts, editorial and publicity materials.
profile_positions.title: Self Employed

profile_positions.description: Since 2005, this cultural platform examines the impact of digital technologies and applied sciences on art, design, culture and contemporary society. As Social Media Manager, I produce and coordinate social media content and strategies (Hootsuite, Buffer, Crowdfire, TweetDeck), I measure and track the effectiveness of outreach tactics (Facebook Insights, Google Analytics/URL Shortner), I supervise community engagement strategies (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, WordPress) and enhance partnerships and collaborations. I am responsible for PR & communications (newsletter, press releases, communication project management, marketing) and as part of the editorial board, I occasionally contribute to the revision/production of editorial contents.
profile_positions.title: Content Specialist, Press & Media Manager

profile_positions.description: RetailMeNot is a marketplace that helps retailers and brands connect with shoppers to drive engagement and sales. As online editor, I am responsible for web content writing and online B2C marketing. I concept and write copy for e-commerce retailers (Amazon, adidas, Nike, YOOX a.o.) relying on - and further developing - my skills in communication, SEO, and content editing. I work with the company in-house CMS Cloud.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Online Editor

profile_positions.description:
4bid Gallery is an artist-run space based in OT301 Amsterdam, since 2013.
It seeks to facilitate culture and art practices through public series of experimental activities that range from visual to performative arts. Developing ‘temporary cultures’ through a gallery program based on open calls, the space experiments alternative ways of exhibiting and producing artworks, and tries to directly engage the audience in cultural production. As cultural producer, curator, documenter/cataloguer, I contributed to the curatorial program and cultural agenda of the gallery: I helped in developing and producing art projects, exhibitions, events, meetings and discussions.
profile_positions.title: Cultural Producer

profile_positions.description: The Information Technology and IT Support Unit of the Directorate-General for Translation offers IT services and support to translators over in-house softwares, hardwares and CAT tools. As responsible for content creation and communication, I mediated between clients and suppliers, translating the needs and requests of both parts into written and audio-visual contents. I managed the internal website page by creating and updating contents (tutorials, blog posts, press releases, short articles, campaigns). I mainly worked with/on CMS, platforms and tools like WordPress, SharePoint, Studio, and in-house CAT tools.
profile_positions.title: IT Support and Communication Trainee

profile_positions.description:
Member of the Wind 'Fans' Group. We developed a sensor using OLIMEX WIFI ESP8266 module, to measure the wind energy generated at our home. The project focused on Smart Citizens vs Smart City, approaching current developments of the technosphere from a sustainable perspective.

https://waag.org/en/blog/mapping-wind-directions-amsterdam
profile_positions.title: Contributor to Amsterdam Smart Citizens Lab

profile_positions.description: I helped in site-specific installations builds-up realized in collaboration with MADRE – Musem of contemporary Art DonnaREgina (Napoli, Italy), Fondazione Morra (Napoli, Italy), Hermann Nitsch Museum (Napoli, Italy), and Italian Ministry of Culture. Besides being in charge of welcoming and guiding visitors, I was responsible for general administration: supplies locating and inventory, filing and organizing documents and receipts. I managed PR and communication (press releases, leaflets translation), internal communication (teamwork coordination) and external relations (mediation with cultural and political institutions).
profile_positions.title: Art Production Manager

volunteer_experiences.description: Volunteer at Guerilla Kitchen Amsterdam, a community gathering waste food from local stores and restaurants, and recycling it into delicious dishes for people of Amsterdam.
